verses.name: 2 Kings 3:7
verses.text: And he went and sent to Jehoshaphat the king of Judah, saying, The king of Moab hath rebelled against me: wilt thou go with me against Moab to battle? And he said, I will go up: I am as thou art, my people as thy people, and my horses as thy horses.

verses.name: 2 Kings 3:8
verses.text: And he said, Which way shall we go up? And he answered, The way through the wilderness of Edom.
